page.shortlink: api sql namespace connection class remove event script function
page.description: Remove an event script previously added with AddEventScript.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = RemoveEventScript([, Name as C])

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The name of the script. If no name is provided, the function removes the most recently added script.

return.name: Result_Flag
return.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The RemoveEventScript() method removes an event script (see SQL Events ) from the connection.
